css: body{font-family:Arial,sans-serif;background:#f0f2f5;margin:20px;display:flex;justify-content:center} .tabs-card{background:#fff;border-radius:6px;box-shadow:0 2px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.15);width:300px;max-width:100%;padding:15px;box-sizing:border-box} .card-header{text-align:center;margin-bottom:10px} .card-title{font-size:18px;margin:0;color:#222} .card-subtitle{font-size:12px;color:#666;margin-top:2px} .tabs-nav{display:flex;justify-content:space-between;margin-bottom:12px} .tab-btn{flex:1;background:#e3e5e7;border:none;padding:6px 0;margin:0 3px;border-radius:4px;cursor:pointer;font-size:12px;color:#555;transition:background 0.3s} .tab-btn.active, .tab-btn:hover{background:#3b82f6;color:#fff} .tab-content{min-height:100px} .tab-pane{display:none} .tab-pane.active{display:block} h3{font-size:14px;margin:0 0 8px;color:#333} p, ul{font-size:11px;color:#444;line-height:1.3;margin:0 0 8px} ul{padding-left:18px} li{margin-bottom:4px} .stats{display:flex;justify-content:space-between;flex-wrap:wrap} .stats > div{width:48%;margin-bottom:8px;background:#f7f9fc;padding:8px;border-radius:4px;text-align:center;font-size:12px;color:#222} .stats strong{display:block;font-size:16px;margin-bottom:2px} form{display:flex;flex-direction:column} label{font-size:11px;color:#444;margin-bottom:8px;display:flex;flex-direction:column} input,textarea{margin-top:4px;padding:6px;border:1px solid #ccc;border-radius:3px;font-size:11px;font-family:inherit;resize:none} textarea{height:60px} button[type=submit]{background:#3b82f6;color:#fff;border:none;padding:8px;border-radius:4px;cursor:pointer;font-size:12px;transition:background 0.3s} button[type=submit]:hover{background:#2563eb}
